full_transcript.en: It's a way to improve your self-concept, and what you do is you just write out "I am" statements. So could be physical, it could be internal like "I'm smart, I'm funny, I'm ambitious, I'm driven." Writing things out helps so much - if I don't write it out like I will never think about it again cuz my brain's just like overloaded all the time. This might seem like a really trivial exercise, truly writing things down like this is what works the most. At least not even just for me but it's like a scientific fact - if you write things out, it's more likely to be true.
full_transcript.cn: 这是一种提升自我认知的方法，你要做的就是写下"我是"的陈述句。这些陈述可以是关于外表的，也可以是内在的，比如"我很聪明、我很幽默、我很有抱负、我很有干劲"。把事情写下来真的很有帮助，如果我不写下来的话，我就再也不会去想它了，因为我的大脑总是处于超负荷状态。这可能看起来像是一个很简单的练习，但说实话，这样把事情写下来是最有效的方法。不仅对我来说是这样，这简直就是一个科学事实，如果你把事情写下来，它就更有可能成为现实。
